mapper.select: select * from sys_user where account=#{userName} and delete_flag =0 limit 1

SELECT u.*, d.`name` AS deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name`) AS roleNames, GROUP_CONCAT(r.`id`) AS roleIds, cu.`nick_name` AS createByName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.`dept_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id=ur.`user_id` LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.`role_id` =r.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_user cu ON u.`create_by` = cu.`id`
and u.delete_flag = 0
and u.nick_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
GROUP BY u.id
